name: Dangerously Fast Delivery
description:
Deliver as many pizzas as you can without crashing!

This game was originally made in 3 hours for Trijam #146: Fast food, fast dude.
This is the post jam version, which has +1 hour of minor improvements, fixes, and a few additional background graphics.

Controls

Keyboard: [WASD] or [Arrow Keys]
Gamepad: Left Stick

Credits

A game by Emmy and Thomas.
All visuals and sound effects were made within the 3 hour jam time.

Music
Bushwick Tarantella Loop Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
